@seefer preaching about things doesnt change the fact that drugs are illegal and drug tests can get you fired or prevent you from getting a decent job.

however i do know for a fact that if people remain sober they will be sharper and more intelligent than when they get intoxicated, even occasionally. there is a big difference between a person who has been sober for a couple days and someone who has been sober for months.

on a personal note though i dont really care if you want to do drugs so can get wasted and laugh at moronic things. It doesnt really affect me at all, so do whatever you want.

when you look around at upper educated professionals the vast majority of them are sober almost all the time. the proof is in the pudding so to speak.
